item.title: Migrating my hopelessly outdated Hugo blog with Claude Code
item.description: I haven't really touched my blog since 2019. The theme was ancient, jQuery was everywhere, and I kept putting off the inevitable migration. Then I decided to let an LLM do it. Here's what happened when Claude Code spent an evening trying to modernize my setup.
